anathema: dishonor your family, willingly break a contract or oath, irreparably damage an ancestral relic
edict: develop skills useful to your community (especially crafting, mining, and trading), honor your ancestors through traditions and rituals
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dwarven Pantheon](/Deities.aspx?ID=196)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup>

The dwarven gods are one large family, with [Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18) as its patriarch. He is joined by his brothers [Magrim](/Deities.aspx?ID=90) (the Taskmaster) and [Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=84) (the Forge Fire), his half-sister [Dranngvit](/Deities.aspx?ID=86) (the Debt Minder), and his wife [Folgrit](/Deities.aspx?ID=87) (the Watchful Mother). His children are [Bolka](/Deities.aspx?ID=85) (the Golden Gift), [Grundinnar](/Deities.aspx?ID=88) (the Peacemaker), [Kols](/Deities.aspx?ID=89) (the Oath-Keeper), and [Trudd](/Deities.aspx?ID=91) (the Mighty). Torag’s evil former student [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28) (the Dark Smith), though technically part of the dwarven pantheon, is rarely invoked by any save duergars.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Pantheons](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=18)

**Edicts** develop skills useful to your community (especially crafting, mining, and trading), honor your ancestors through traditions and rituals

**Anathema** dishonor your family, willingly break a contract or oath, irreparably damage an ancestral relic

**Area of Concern**
ancestry, crafting, dwarves, relationships

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, NG, N

**Pantheon Members**
[Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=294)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

**Favored Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=47)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=36)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ant Haul](/Spells.aspx?ID=13)

- **4th**
[Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54)

- **7th**
[Retrocognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=260)

</column>
name: Dwarven Pantheon
